sentences.en: Gail was silent for a moment, regarding Harry with his steady gaze.
sentences.cn: 盖尔镇定地注视着哈里，沉默了片刻。

sentences.en: He avoids any eye contact, quickly averting his gaze when anyone approaches.
sentences.cn: 他避免任何眼神接触，一有人靠近就把目光迅速移开。

sentences.en: He had an extraordinarily penetrating gaze.
sentences.cn: 他的目光有股异乎寻常的洞察力.

sentences.en: He sat down, purposely avoiding her gaze.
sentences.cn: 他坐了下来，有意避开她的目光。

sentences.en: Her cheeks grew hot beneath the gaze of so many eyes.
sentences.cn: 在众目睽睽之下,她的脸红了.

sentences.en: Her eyes fell before his steady gaze.
sentences.cn: 在他的逼视下,她双目低垂.

sentences.en: Her gaze met Michael's for a split second.
sentences.cn: 她和迈克尔在一瞬间四目相对。

sentences.en: Her gaze sharpened, as if she had seen something unusual.
sentences.cn: 她眼睛一亮，仿佛看见了什么不寻常的事情。

sentences.en: Her gaze sweeps rapidly around the room.
sentences.cn: 她快速地扫视了一下这个房间。

sentences.en: Her gaze was drawn irresistibly to the scene outside.
sentences.cn: 她的目光禁不住被外面的风景所吸引.

sentences.en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentences.cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentences.en: I noticed, behind the neutrality of his gaze, a deep weariness.
sentences.cn: 我注意到他不露声色的注视背后藏着深深的厌倦。

sentences.en: Patrick sat gazing into space  (= looking straight in front, not at any particular person or thing ).
sentences.cn: 帕特里克坐着，茫然地看着前方。

sentences.en: She lowered her gaze to the hands in her lap.
sentences.cn: 她低头盯着放在大腿上的双手。

sentences.en: The interior was shielded from the curious gaze of passersby.
sentences.cn: 屋子内部被挡住了，以防路人好奇地张望。

sentences.en: The Monsignor turned his gaze from the flames to meet the Colonel's.
sentences.cn: 这位大人凝视的目光离开火苗，与上校的目光相遇。

phrases.tran_cn: ◎【纹章学】(鹿或类似鹿的动物)从旁看去似在盯着人看的，侧身正视的

trans.tran_en: to look at someone or something for a long time, giving it all your attention, often without realizing you are doing so
